      • getPairedFastqSeqsFromHashSet

        public void getPairedFastqSeqsFromHashSet(java.util.HashSet list,
                                 java.io.File fastqLeft,
                                 java.io.File fastqRight,
                                 java.io.File fastqLeftOut,
                                 java.io.File fastqRightOut)
                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Extract paired-end fastq sequences from a list of sequence names
        Parameters:
        list - a HashSet of read names
        fastqFileInLeft - all left-handed reads
        fastqFileInRight - all right-handed reads
        fastqFileOutLeft - the left-handed reads in the list
        fastqFileOutRight - the right-handed reads in the list
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

                                        java.io.IOException
        Extract fastq sequences in a list from a file of single-end fastq sequences
        Parameters:
        listFile - a file of read names, one per line
        fastqFileIn - the fastq file to search for the read names
        fastqFileOut - the fastq file of found read names

        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • fastqToFastaSixFrameTranslation

        public void fastqToFastaSixFrameTranslation(java.io.File fastqIn,
                                   java.io.File fastaOut,
                                   boolean includeDNASeq)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a file of six-frame translations (in fasta format) from a fastq file
        Parameters:
        fastqIn - the fastq file to translate
        fastaOut - the translation file
        includeDNASeq - set to true if the original DNA sequence is required in the outfile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
